page.title: 07Haverfordwest Schools (2).
page.content: The following Primary Schools educate 1,287 children aged 3 to 11: Fenton C.P. Infants, Mount Airey C.P. Infants Barn Street C.P. Junior,Mary Immaculate R.C.School, St. Marks V.A. School, Haverfordwest V.C. School, Haylett Grange School. Haylett Grange School is a Private school which is not funded by the L.E.A.(Dyfed County Council).The other schools are funded by the L.E.A. except St. Marks and Haverfordwest V.C. which are partly funded by The Church in Wales and Mary Immaculate which is partly funded by the Roman Catholic Church. . 117 children and adults with Special Educational Needs are educated at Overdale and Portfield Special Schools All these schools have fields and playgrounds and provide school meals. Transport is provided to some of these schools for children in rural areas.
